name: Satish Kumar

details: Designed and implemented cross-platform UIs (Android/iOS, Web, macOS/Windows).
Built a Figma plugin for automated theme/asset extraction, ensuring consistency across multiple apps.
Developed modular, reusable components to improve scalability, maintainability, and multi-app support.
Resolved app crashes/ANRs, reducing crash rate by 1%, and optimized app size by 20%.
Worked as an Individual Contributor (IC), taking full ownership of architecture, feature development, testing, and deployment.
Collaborated closely with cross-functional teams to deliver features on time with high quality.
Mentored junior developers by providing reviews, technical guidance, and enforcing clean code practices.
Participated in product roadmap discussions, influencing feature prioritization with technical feasibility insights.
Enhanced performance monitoring by integrating analytics and crashlytics.
Contributed to SDK and plugin development for shared use across multiple apps.
Led end-to-end development of a multi-flavor e-commerce application from design to launch.
Delivered core features including PLP, PDP, Cart, Wishlist, Checkout, and Order Tracking.
Integrated services such as Google Maps, Firebase, Payment Gateways, and Analytics.
Managed theme configuration and branding for multiple app flavors.
Owned complete iOS delivery including App Store releases and APNs integration.
Improved performance & security by adding offline support, optimizing load times, and implementing secure authentication flows.
Developed interactive learning-based apps and games, ensuring responsiveness across multiple screen sizes.
Built a Paint Application with complex canvas animations.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to deliver features and resolve product issues.

projects: Howzat (Fantasy Game | 10M+ downloads): Modular features, secure payments & WebSockets, push notifications (FCM & APNs).

BMMI & Alosra Shops (E-Commerce): Designed & developed 2 mobile apps, integrated REST APIs, Firebase Authentication & Firestore, push notifications.

achievements: Spot Award for outstanding problem-solving – Junglee Games - 2025
